channel.title: Can you portforward on Utorrent
channel.description:
I do not have acces to my router password im afraid so i can not Portforward sad yes... but i did here you can portforward your server with Utorrent.
Here are my questions:
Can you really do this:
If so does this mean other people got to have Utorrent to play it:
Will it harm your computer:
Thank you very much for all who helps me

item.title: Can you portforward on Utorrent

item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

alright if you dont mind me asking how do you if you dont have the time i always got youtube and google

thanks in advance

item.title: Can you portforward on Utorrent
item.dc:creator: @Lation Lation
item.description:
@Lation wrote:

Yes you can use uTorrent (I do)
Do other people need to download to play? Nope
Will it harm you computer? Not at all!

Read full topic
